title: After Surviving The Sss-Rank Demon Territory With A Useless Skill, I Became The Strongest Alchemist In The World ~Creating A Comfortable Base And Enjoying Life With Friends In Another World~
alternative_title: 外れスキルでSSSランク魔境を生き抜いたら、世界最強の錬金術師になっていた～快適拠点をつくって仲間と楽しい異世界ライフ～ ; Hazure Skill de SSS Rank Makyo wo Tara, Sekai Saikyou no Renkinjutsushi ni Natteita Kaiteki Kyoten wo Tsukutte Nakama to Tanoshi Isekai Life
status: 外れスキルでSSSランク魔境を生き抜いたら、世界最強の錬金術師になっていた～快適拠点をつくって仲間と楽しい異世界ライフ～ ; Hazure Skill de SSS Rank Makyo wo Tara, Sekai Saikyou no Renkinjutsushi ni Natteita Kaiteki Kyoten wo Tsukutte Nakama to Tanoshi Isekai Life
description:
Description :
        Sora was summoned to another world as a hero. While other heroes were bestowed with powerful combat skills, Sora’s skill was something ordinary: “Alchemy.” Ridiculed for having a useless skill, he was exiled to the “Demon Forest.” However, little did they know, his skill was actually an exceptional SSS-Rank skill! Utilizing his alchemy, an unconventional survival journey in another world begins!
